meanings.definition: The study of signs and symbols.
meanings.sent1: In semeiology class, we learn about different symbols and what they mean.
meanings.sent2: She found semeiology fascinating and enjoyed decoding the signs around her.
meanings.sent3: The detective used his semeiology skills to decipher the mysterious message left at the crime scene.
meanings.sent4: Her semeiology expertise allowed her to see beyond the surface and understand the hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: Through the lens of semeiology, the ancient hieroglyphics came to life with stories of the past.

meanings.definition: The science of interpreting signs and symptoms.
meanings.sent1: Doctors rely on semeiology to understand what the patient's symptoms may indicate.
meanings.sent2: The semeiology of a cough can reveal underlying health issues.
meanings.sent3: The semeiology of her cat's behavior suggested it was time for a visit to the vet.
meanings.sent4: His semeiology skills were so sharp that he could predict an illness before it fully developed.
meanings.sent5: In the world of medicine, semeiology plays a crucial role in diagnosing patients accurately.
